4. limit the amount of personal information you share online, especially when it comes to financial details or health information.
5. use two-factor authentication whenever possible.
6. be wary of unsolicited messages from people or accounts you don't know.
7. review and adjust your privacy settings regularly as social media platforms may update their policies.
